name: Island Maintenance
description:
This game was made within 3 hours for Trijam#105 with the theme: Islands.

[Controls]

Click and hold left click to  launch your moai hook(You have to time your shots!)

Right click: Change directional rotation of your moai character

W: Speed up your moai character.

Looks like your in charge of handling 3 islands at once and maintaining every bits and pieces of it.  

Your objective is to handle any sudden maintenances that occurs within each island. 

You lose if you either lose all your lives or 2 out of the 3 islands are poorly maintained.

Also, be careful of the meteors that drops!

A red exclamation mark will pop up when it needs maintenance. That's when you take action and handle it accordingly.

Fortunately, your character has a decent gravitational pull for each island, so you can rotate around it and shift from island to island!
